item.description:
Every month in conjunction with its "Phoenix After Hours" event on the first Thursday of the month, the Wadsworth Atheneum shows a film tied in with the theme of the event. Since it's at the beginning of December, they will be showing "LOVE ACTUALLY" about which their website says: "This comedy follows the love lives of eight very different couples in various interrelated tales set during the frantic month before Christmas." A guy friend of mine who isn't a chick-flick type said it's worth seeing.


ADDITIONAL DETAILS:
Screening starts at 8:00pm. Price is included in the "Phoenix After Hours" entrance fee of $5.
2003. UK/USA.
130 min. Rated R.
Directed by Richard Curtis.
Starring: Emma Thompson, Colin Firth, Liam Neeson, Hugh Grant, Keira Knightley, and many others
More information about the movie: http://www.imdb.com/t...
item.name: "Love Actually" @ Phoenix After Hours
